text: Saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissaṃsu nayidaṃ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvatteyyuṃ labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesu nti
edit: Saṅkhārā ca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissaṃsu nayidaṃ saṅkhārā ābādhāya saṃvatteyyuṃ labbhetha ca saṅkhāresu – evaṃ me saṅkhārā hontu evaṃ me saṅkhārā mā ahesu nti

translations.transtext: If these mental formations, monks, was the self, these mental formations would not exist for illness, and [you] might obtain these mental formations thus, "May my mental formations be in this way, may my mental formations not have been in this way."
